entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
